mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO aphi_TARGET_METHOD ( group_id , hos_id , copy_code , target_code , fun_para_code , method_code , formula_code , fun_code
) VALUES ( #{group_id} , #{hos_id} , #{copy_code} , #{target_code} , #{fun_para_code} , #{method_code} , #{formula_code} , #{fun_code} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM aphi_target_method WHERE group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code = #{copy_code} and target_code = #{target_code}
mapper.select: SELECT group_id, hos_id, copy_code, target_code, method_code, formula_code, fun_code FROM aphi_target_method WHERE group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code = #{copy_code} and target_code = #{target_code}

SELECT ptm.group_id, ptm.hos_id, ptm.copy_code, ptm.target_code , pt.target_name , pt.target_note, ptm.method_code , ptmp.method_name, ptm.formula_code , pfo.formula_name , ptm.fun_code , pfu.fun_name , ptn.nature_code , ptn.nature_name , to_char(pfo.formula_method_chs) formula_method_chs , pfo.formula_method_eng, pfu.fun_note , pt.is_stop, pfu.fun_method_chs FROM aphi_target_method ptm left join aphi_target_method_para ptmp on ptm.method_code = ptmp.method_code and ptm.group_id = ptmp.group_id and ptm.hos_id = ptmp.hos_id and ptm.copy_code = ptmp.copy_code left join aphi_target pt on ptm.target_code= pt.target_code and ptm.group_id= pt.group_id and ptm.hos_id = pt.hos_id and ptm.copy_code = pt.copy_code left join aphi_target_nature ptn on pt.target_nature = ptn.nature_code and ptm.group_id = ptn.group_id and ptm.hos_id = ptn.hos_id and ptm.copy_code = ptn.copy_code left join aphi_formula pfo on ptm.formula_code = pfo.formula_code and ptm.group_id = pfo.group_id and ptm.hos_id = pfo.hos_id and ptm.copy_code = pfo.copy_code left join aphi_fun pfu on ptm.fun_code = pfu.fun_code and ptm.group_id = pfu.group_id and ptm.hos_id = pfu.hos_id and ptm.copy_code = pfu.copy_code WHERE ptm.group_id = #{group_id} and ptm.hos_id = #{hos_id} and ptm.copy_code = #{copy_code} and ptm.target_code = #{target_code}
